page.title: 16FARMING (Sample)
page.content: I am 10 years old and my name is Colette.I live on a farm near Glenavy. I have two brothers and one sister. My daddy owns 40 acres and rents another 20 acres. just now we have 28 Friesian cows milking with another 9 heifers due to calve soon. The day begins early with daddy getting up at 6,30 to fetch the cows from pasture to the milking parlour. The milk runs through pipes into a tank and is collected by the Milk Marketing Board every day around 9.00 a.m. Milking is finished by 8.00 a.m. and we have breakfast. In the evening starting at 5.00 p.m. the same work is repeated. This time I help to bring in the cows and give them nuts to eat while milking. In early spring slurry is spread on the fields to make sure of a good grass crop, and then in June the first
